TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRow extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand

summary.span: 表示 控件中的行。

span.span: Represents a row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示中的行控件。The class represents a row in a control. 您可以检索通过行和控件的集合。You can retrieve rows through the and collections of the control. 与不同、以物理方式包含所有的行中单元格的集合。Unlike a , a physically contains a collection of all of the cells in that row. 您可以访问此集合通过属性。You can access this collection through the property. 类用于访问单个单元格元素调整的外观和行为行用户界面 (UI)，例如高度和单元格样式。The class is used to access the individual cell elements, as well as to adjust the appearance and behavior of the row user interface (UI), such as height and cell style. 通常情况下，您将需要的所有行或控件可以共享相同的特性中的大多数行。Typically, you will want all rows or most rows in the control to share the same characteristics. 若要在控件中设置的所有行的单元格样式，设置返回的对象的属性属性。To set cell styles for all rows in the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property. 若要设置交替行样式，请使用属性。To set styles for alternating rows, use the property. 有关单元格样式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 此外可以使用属性来定义将用于添加到控件的所有行作为基础的行。You can also use the property to define a row that will be used as a basis for all rows added to the control. 控件将共享跨多个数据行，只要有可能可以避免性能受到影响的对象。The control will share objects across multiple data rows whenever possible to avoid performance penalties. 除非你正在使用大量的数据和遇到性能问题，您通常可以忽略行共享。Unless you are working with large amounts of data and experiencing performance issues, you can typically ignore row sharing. 共享的行由属性值为-1。A shared row is indicated by an property value of -1. 某些成员类不能用于共享行，但可以取消行共享的访问通过属性。Some members of the class cannot be used with shared rows, but you can unshare a row by accessing it through the property. 行也可能会变为不共享该行中的其他方法。Rows can also become unshared in other ways. 若要访问而无需取消它的共享状态的行，使用方法。To access a row without unsharing it, use the method. 在使用大量的数据，您应注意的共享和取消共享以避免性能损失行。When working with large amounts of data, you should be aware of how rows are shared and unshared to avoid performance penalties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewRowDemo.cpp#209)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewRowDemo.cs#209)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewrowdemo.vb#209)]

span.para: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new row, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示用户右键单击该行，除非时显示的快捷菜单控制事件或行属性将替代被单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。This property indicates the shortcut menu that is displayed when the user right-clicks the row unless the control event or the row property overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 当控件属性设置或其属性是`true`，获取的值属性将引发控件的事件，并返回的值为属性指定在事件处理程序。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果没有为事件处理程序，则获取的值属性返回以前指定的值或其默认值为`null`。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`. 处理事件时，可以主要使用大量的数据以避免性能损失，设置行时的多个行的值。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 更改此属性将引发对所具有的事件，如果存在一个。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. 如果当前行共享的使用方法，而无需获取此属性的值。If the current row is shared, use the method rather than getting the value of this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，它几乎等同于属性的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, which is nearly identical to the property of the class. 此代码示例中提供一个更大的代码示例摘自类。This code example is part of a larger code example provided in the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#130)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#130)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#130)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 到数据源包含的对象不能直接访问时，通过行对象直接访问数据绑定对象非常有用。Accessing data-bound objects directly through row objects is useful when you do not have direct access to the data source containing the objects. 如果你想要操作绑定到所选行或行作为参数传递给事件处理程序的对象，此选项也方便。It is also convenient when you want to manipulate objects bound to selected rows or to rows passed as arguments to event handlers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问业务对象绑定到某行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a business object bound to a row. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 访问对象绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-objects-bound-to-windows-forms-datagridview-rows.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Access Objects Bound to Windows Forms DataGridView Rows](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-objects-bound-to-windows-forms-datagridview-rows.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件显示其使用指示单元格的样式的单元格属性，它继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 通过指定的样式中此行的单元格，为属性重写通过指定的样式， ， ，和属性，但通过指定的样式重写属性。For cells in this row, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the , , , and properties, but are overridden by the styles specified through the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 获取此属性时如果属性尚未被访问，则将创建带有默认值。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 获取此属性为多个行时，这会导致对性能产生影响。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 只要有可能，使用单个设置此属性的多个行。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不能使用共享的行。You cannot use this property with a shared row. 有关共享的行的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如果属性是，用户将不能手动调整行的高度。If the property is , the user will not be able to manually adjust the row height. 默认情况下属性值基于属性值。By default, the property value is based on the property value. 如果显式设置到或，但是，将忽略控件值。If you explicitly set to or , however, the control value is ignored. 设置到还原值继承行为。Set to to restore the value-inheritance behavior. 因为恢复值继承属性将永远不会返回值，除非行尚未添加到控件。Because restores the value inheritance, the property will never return a value unless the row has not been added to a control. 如果您需要确定是否行的属性值继承或显式指定检查其属性。If you need to determine whether the property value of a row is inherited or has been specified explicitly, check its property. 如果值包括标志，不继承属性值。If the value includes the flag, the property value is not inherited. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks `values`参数表示用于填充单元格的行中的值的参数数目可变。The `values` parameter represents a variable number of arguments used to populate cell values in the row. 这些值可以传递给此方法，作为多个，单个参数，或者作为成员的单个。These values can be passed to this method as multiple, individual arguments or as members of a single . 因为这些值应该为类型的实例，但是，如果传递的是值类型值的数组 (如值)，此方法将数组视为单个对象并将其分配给单个单元格。Because the values are expected to be instances of type , however, if you pass in an array of value-type values (such as values), this method will treat the array as a single object and assign it to a single cell. 若要避免此行为，必须强制转换将值类型阵列分区到数组或作为多个参数的多个值传递。To avoid this behavior, you must cast a value-type array to an array or pass in multiple values as multiple arguments. 如果有多个值中的`values`列表不是有要初始化的单元格，此方法将忽略多余的值并返回`false`。If there are more values in the `values` list than there are cells to be initialized, this method ignores the extra values and returns `false`. 此方法也返回`false`如果不能设置任何指定的值。This method also returns `false` if any of the specified values cannot be set. 如果有较少的值多于存在的单元格，其余不匹配的单元格将保留其当前值。If there are fewer values than there are cells, the remaining unmatched cells retain their current values.
